entry.title: SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-plugin-database
entry.summary:
Decky Plugin Database. PR your plugins to this repository to have them added to the store!

Decky Plugin Database

This repository exists solely for submissions and testing purposes.

Use the built-in Plugin Store to download and install plugins.

Submit your plugin

To submit a plugin to Decky's plugin store, open a pull request adding your plugin as a submodule (tatke a look at #8 for example).

Don't forget to adhere to the pull request template.
